subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: A proposed celebration for the Aspen homeowner Lance Armstrong, who finished third in the Tour de France, has fueled a debate among residents and elected officials.
snippet: A proposed celebration for the Aspen homeowner Lance Armstrong, who finished third in the Tour de France, has fueled a debate among residents and elected officials.
